Planned Work
[D] No trains between Bay Pkwy and Stillwell Av

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
All times until 5 AM Mon, Jul 23

[D] service operates between 205 St, Bronx and Bay Pkwy, Brooklyn.

Note: No [D] trains between 62 St and Stillwell Av on Saturdays and Sundays, 9 AM to 8 PM.

[SB] buses run in both directions between Bay Pkwy and Stillwell Av,
making stops at 25 Av and Bay 50 St.

• Transfer between [SB] buses and [D] trains at Bay Pkwy.
• Transfer between [SB] buses and [F] [N] [Q] trains at Stillwell Av.
• Transfer between [D] and [N] trains at 62 St-New Utrecht Av or 36 St.

All times until Fri, Aug 31

The new B15, Q3 and Q10 bus stop is located at the
Terminal 5 AirTrain Station (adjacent to the former
Terminal 6).

Access to the remainder of the Central Terminal area
is available for no additional fare via AirTrain.

4 bus stop.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Planned Detour
Bx28, Bx30, Bx38, Bx39, Bx41, Bx55 and BxM11 bus stop changes

All times

Bus stops will be changed due to the completion of the Gun Hill
Intermodel project at the Gun Hill [2] [5] Station. The project
introduces bus-only lanes, a layover area for the Bx41 bus and
a bus island for the Bx39 and Bx41 bus routes.

New Northbound Bus Stops:
Bx39/Bx41:
On White Plain Rd, nearside of E 211 St - New bus Island.
Bx55:
On White Plains Rd, nearside of E Gun Hill Rd - No change.
BxM11:
On White Plains Rd, nearside of E Gun Hill Rd-Bx55 stop.

New Southbound Bus Stops:
Bx39/Bx41:
On White Plains Rd, nearside of E Gun Hill Rd.
BxM11:
On White Plains Rd, nearside of E Gun Hill Rd.

New Westbound Bus Stops:
Bx28/Bx38:
Restored to original location on E Gun Hill Rd, farside of
White Plains Rd at [2][5] Gun Hill Rd Station.
Bx30:
Temporary stop now permanent on E Gun Hill Rd, nearside
of White Plains Rd.

Eastbound Bus Stop:
Bx28/Bx30/Bx38:
On E Gun Hill Rd, farside of White Plain Rd-No change.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12 SBS buses detoured due to construction

All times

Buses detoured from Pelham Pkwy East main road between
Bronx Park East and Stillwell Av, then will operate as follows:

Eastbound: Buses will use the service road.

• Please allow additional travel time.

North.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 07/19/2012 10:43PM

Q44 and Q50 buses are detoured,�southbound�only. Due to construction on the Whitestone Bridge.

The detour is as follows:

Southbound Q44: Via Hutchinson River Pkwy, left turn on Lafayette Ave, right turn on Cross Bronx Expwy. Service Rd to Throgs Neck Bridge. Stay in center lane on Bridge to Clearview Expwy. Exit at 26th Ave, right turn on 26th Avenue to Francis Lewis Blvd. Right turn on Francis Lewis Blvd to Cross Island Pkwy. Service Rd to 14th Ave, left turn on 14th Ave to Parsons Blvd, left on Parsons Blvd to regular route.

Southbound Q50: Via Hutchinson River Pkwy, left turn on Lafayette Ave, right turn on Cross Bronx Expwy. Service Rd to Throgs Neck Bridge. Stay in center lane on Bridge to Clearview Expwy. Exit at 26th Ave, right turn on 26th Avenue to Francis Lewis Blvd. Right turn on Francis Lewis Blvd to Cross Island Pkwy. Service Rd to 14th Ave, left turn on 14th Ave to Whitestone Expwy Service Rd, left on Whitestone Expwy Service Rd and then regular route.

Please allow for additional travel time.

Buses will make corresponding stops on 108 St and Junction Blvd on the detoured route.

and Richmond Av South, then will operate as follows:

Av and regular route.

at corresponding locations.

line.name: Port Jefferson
line.text:
Port Jefferson Branch:

The 9:55PM train from Huntington due in Port Jefferson at 10:42PM is on the move running 42 minutes late due to a late arriving connection.
